#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	long long int n,x;
	cin>>n;
	map <long long int,long long int> count;
	count.clear();
	for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>x;
		count[x]++;
	}
	long long int total=n*(n-1);
	total/=2;
	for(typeof(count.begin()) it=count.begin();it!=count.end();it++){
		long long int curCount=it->second;
		long long int sub=(curCount*(curCount-1))/2;
		total-=sub;
	}
	cout<<total;
	return 0;
}
